attributes.action: apologize to Iraq, the United Nations and the United Kingdom armed forces for undertaking an illegal invasion of Iraq and to undertake to pay substantial reparations for this illegal act.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given that the Iraq War was illegal under United Nations' procedure and a false reason was given for going to war, the United Kingdom should apologize and pay reparations towards the damage, injury and loss of life caused.
